name: Real-time Language Tralation
desc:
AI-driven web app for real-time language translation and transcription, fine-tuned for Indic languages.
Built using Twilio SDK, Websockets, Flask etc.

name: CCTV software for crime prevention
desc:
Real-time weapon detection and crowd management system using YOLOv8 with integrated website for record access.
Built using Flask, SQLite and Machine Learning.

name: Fine-tuned Whisper AI
desc: Customized Whisper AI model optimized for Indian regional languages. Delivers accurate audio transcription for diverse Indian dialects and accents.

name: Explainable CNN models
desc:
CNN models integrated with Explainable algorithms- LIME, SHAP and ProtoDash.
Built using Tensorflow framework and ai360 library.

name: Library Management System
desc:
Java-based desktop application with Swing & AWT GUI.
Built using JDBC and MySQL database.
